channel.title: Braduz Evolution [DEV]
channel.description:
[CENTER]Hello welcome to my thread i shall be making Braduz Evolution From Scratch 100% better i will be calling upon java coders [/CENTER]
[B]Development:[/B]
#.Willderness- 0% #.Training Island - 0% #. NPC Spawns - 0% #. Client Java - 50% #. Global Objects - 0% #. 317 Server - 60% #.Castle Wars - 0% [COLOR="Red"]#. Clan Chat - 100% #. Trading - 100%[/COLOR] #. Barrows - 0% #.Skills - 50% GOT Defence & attack and Strenth #. Shops Around Runescape 0% #. Global Objects
ILL Be Making the shops around runescape in proper location i.e Silk Shop al-karid & axe repair shop
We Need : #.Java Coders #.Windows VPS
Coding Team :
Braduz - Lead Coder And Developer
Done :
#. Removed ALL NPCS #. Removed ALL Commands Even :master :noclip #. Cleaned Client.java to nice small one #. Webclient setserver("<---IP HERE --->", "<-- PORT -->"); #. Cache for webclient Hosted On Dedicated Server #. WEBCLIENT Done - LINK ( Blr-krewz.co.uk ) #. Commands Done #. Client V1 #. Fixed Background #. Client V1 Teaser Relased #. 317 Client #. Only Connectable if you have my client to my server
[CODE][U]Commands So Far[/U]
Commands
Owner commands (Co-owner) ::banuser ::ipban ::pickup ::kick ::pnpc ::xrichie ::xteleto ::xteletome ::xteleall ::notedbarrows ::players ::ground ::master ::pure ::empty ::sweet ::rich
Administrator Commands ::banuser ::ipban ::kick ::pnpc ::xteleto ::xteletome ::notedbarrows ::brunes2 (10000 Barrage Runes) ::players ::ground ::empty ::sweet ::rich ::runes
Moderator Commands ::banuser ::kick ::xteleto ::xteletome ::notedbarrows ::starter ::brunes (1000 Barrage runes) ::players ::ground ::empty ::rich ::runes
Regular Commands ::starter ::players ::ground ::brunes (1000 barrage runes) ::empty ::runes
[/CODE]
[B]Teaser ScreenShots =] [/B] Client V1 Screenshots :

[CENTER]Hello welcome to my thread i shall be making Braduz Evolution From Scratch 100% better
